about.description:
Flask is a microframework for Python based on Werkzeug and Jinja2. It's
intended for getting started very quickly and was developed with best
intentions in mind.

about.summary: A microframework based on Werkzeug, Jinja2 and good intentions.

name: flask
raw_recipe:
{% set name = "Flask" %}
{% set version = "0.12" %}
{% set hash_type = "sha256" %}
{% set hash = "93e803cdbe326a61ebd5c5d353959397c85f829bec610d59cb635c9f97d7ca8b" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  fn: {{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  {{ hash_type }}: {{ hash }}

build:
  number: 0
  script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record=record.txt
  entry_points:
    - flask = flask.cli:main

requirements:
  build:
    - python
    - setuptools

  run:
    - python
    - click >=2.0
    - itsdangerous >=0.21
    - jinja2 >=2.4
    - werkzeug >=0.7

test:
  imports:
    - flask
    - flask.ext

  commands:
    - flask --help

about:
  home: http://flask.pocoo.org
  license: BSD 3-Clause
  license_family: BSD
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: A microframework based on Werkzeug, Jinja2 and good intentions.
  description: |
    Flask is a microframework for Python based on Werkzeug and Jinja2. It's
    intended for getting started very quickly and was developed with best
    intentions in mind.
  doc_url: http://flask.pocoo.org/docs/0.12
  dev_url: https://github.com/pallets/flask

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - goanpeca

about.description:
Flask is a microframework for Python based on Werkzeug and Jinja2. It's
intended for getting started very quickly and was developed with best
intentions in mind.
